sentence: Monday's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index at 6,823.47.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 2.42 billion.
Advancers stocks led declining by 2.99 to 1 ratio.
There were 2363 advancers and 789 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 13 stocks reached a 52 week high and 8 those reaching lows totaled.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed up 1.02% for the day; a total of 65.58 points.
Liberty Global plc ( LBTYA ) had the largest percent change down (-4.79%) while Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. ( AMD ) had the largest percent change gain rising 8.26%.
The Dow Jones index closed up .42% for the day; a total of 98.19 points.
Coca-Cola Company (The) ( KO ) had the largest percent change down (-1.3%) while Home Depot, Inc. (The) ( HD ) had the largest percent change gain rising 1.97%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
